parameters.content:
## Get keyword
Get keyword, location, language and operation from user.

nodes.name: Add operation to main sheet in Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## Switch
Choose what operation to do. It gets the operation from user.

## Create a sheet
It creates a sheet that its title is {keyword}{operation}.
fr every operation it create a sheet.

## DataforSEO API Request
Send request to DataforSeo with operation, keyword, location_name and language_name.

## Get the Data from API call
It gets the data that needed from last node and ignores every other fields that we don't need.

## Append data to sheet
This node append the data to the sheet created in 'Create a sheet' node.

## Append data to sheet
This node append the data to the sheet created in 'Create a sheet' node.
